definitions: (of a cell or its contents) readily stained only by neutral dyes

examples.text: we investigated the in vitro control of MRSA by neutrophilic granulocytes because they contribute to abscess formation

shortDefinitions: (of cell or its contents) readily stained only by neutral dyes

definitions: (of a medical condition) characterized by the presence of unusually high numbers of neutrophilic cells

examples.text: acute lung injury is characterized by neutrophilic inflammation and increased lung permeability

shortDefinitions: (of medical condition) characterized by presence of unusually high numbers of neutrophilic cells
